p: In this section, we show predictions of our proposed LSTM model on eight affected counties within the United States of America: (a) Los Angeles, California, (b) Dallas, Texas, (c) Hillsborough, Florida, (d) Maricopa, Arizona, (e) King, Washington, (f) Fulton, Georgia, (g) Cook, Illinois, and (h) New York City, New York. Our discussion is based on various lockdown and phased reopening measures in such states [45].
